dict.string: We need to use your camera to attach photos to checklist items. Two photo per item.
We need access to your photo library to choose an existing photo.
We need to access your location so that we can add GPS coordinates, closest tide and wind info to your Notes and Emergency Text.
We need your permission to record audio when you create a voice note.
We need access to your photo library so you can attach an existing photo to your checklist item.
